comments.author: Zlantann
comments.body: Quote from: makerfans22 on May 23, 2022, 05:39:49 PMthe most profitable cryptocurrency investment website make 28% every months Get 28% investment profit for doing nothing? This sounds like a Ponzi scheme or scam site. How would this company make profit or cover their running cost? What are they investing your money on and how much returns would they get from the investment? Please watch before you leap because you might end up loosing your hard earned money. This 28% profit offer is to attract greedy investor that have been blindfolded by this offer. This platform might pay the first few investors so that they can refer other people and immediately the get enough investors the site would just closeup.

comments.author: bittraffic
comments.body: Looking on his website, it does sounds like he is setting up a trust fund company. But you can dig deeper into this account you'll see wallaz is offering binary options on the youtube video. If its offering 28% per month, that's really huge to actually believe. It won't take long for the company to shutdown without notice. In short Scam.https://archive.vn/rQg8u - wallaz.onlinehttps://archive.vn/TyVze - youtube.com

comments.author: maydna
comments.body: I don't want to risk my money with a site I don't know, especially if the money to invest is too big. The minimum amount to invest in that website is too big for me, and I am too afraid to lose that. Even if some people are willing to risk their money by investing on that site, I still do not recommend them to do that. It is better to use $1000 to buy bitcoin and hold it for some time. That will guarantee you to make a big profit in the future. But all in all, you have your own decision.

comments.author: swogerino
comments.body: 28% says it all.No legit business can offer that high return monthly,even yearly that would still be unsustainable for many legit businesses.In fact legit businesses the maximum that they can give is like 5% yearly and that is also difficult to sustain if the business has not a high turnover.I still can't believe that there are people who fall for such bullshit because these were common in the years 2013-2015 but now we are in 2022 and no one anymore falls for such low level scam attempts.

comments.author: nakamura12
comments.body: This is a typical Ponzi scheme and there is something in the website that make it more obvious which is the Investment Plan as you can see it in the site. Many of the Ponzi scheme websites are like that where their investors are promised to earn a good percentage of profit just like this one. During the time I stayed in Bitcointalk forum, I always noticed this so called investment plan from ponzi scheme websites and later on, it was proven that it is indeed a scam site.

comments.author: Tellek Garing

I'm surprised that there's still website like this and people that still investing on obvious scam that promised a massive passive income every month.The website package of investment is BS.Ponzi considered as a gamble, any ways I still have some trust in gambling since it have a system in place for you to lose your money, but Ponzi on the other it  just simply robbing petter to pay Paul and in no time the bubble will bursts.I don't know why the ops will bring such an investment advert to a gambling board or even to this forum, since we have zero tolerance for scam on bitcointalk. Thank goodness the ops are already marked in red which will prevent a lot of users here from being scammed by the website the op is advertising.
